thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 7 of 2268
thread.title: Benrie

author: Benrie
title: Benrie
text: The website was very helpful - easy to select the correct blinds from the serial number on the windows. Price was very competetive, and the fulfilment of the order was very quick. They were very easy to fit - just four screws and very clear instructions on how to do it. Took just 3 mins each window. At first I was disaapointed that the frame work was steel coloured instead of white but then once fitted I see they matched exactly the steel colour of the Velux hardware.
